title: values to make expression true - determine result

content.description:
In the following Boolean expression, the  int  variables  x  and  y  have been properly declared and initialized.
 (x <= 10) == (y > 25)
content.question: Which of the following values for  x  and  y  will result in the expression evaluating to  true?

skill.text: 4.B: Describe the initial conditions that must be met for a code segment to work as intended or described.
